values.value: Required supplies for ANSI Z308.1 Class A First Aid Kits: 16 Adhesive Bandages, 1" x3" 1 Adhesive Tape 2.5 yards 10 Antibiotic Treatment Application 1 Breathing Barrier 1 Burn Dressing, Gel Soaked, 4" x 4" 10 Burn Treatment 1 Cold Pack 2 Eye Covering 1 Eye Wash, 1 ounce 1 First Aid Guide 6 Hand Sanitizer 2 Pair Exam Gloves 1 Roller Bandage, 2" x 4 yards 1 Scissor 2 Sterile Pad, 3" x 3" 2 Trauma Pad, 5" x 9" 1 Triangular Bandage, 40" x 40" x 56" CFR 1910.266 (App A), ANSI Z308.1
Does the First Aid kit present have all required items in sterile condition?
